name: ExpansionProcessingRule
title: ExpansionProcessingRule
description: Defines how concepts are processed into the expansion when it's for UI presentation.

concept.definition: The expansion (when in UI mode) includes all codes *and* any defined groups (in extensions).
The expanion (when in UI mode) lists the groups, and then any codes that have not been included in a group.
The expansion (when in UI mode) only includes the defined groups.
